TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Boring ultramen mysteriously posted.

xadriopfal

8 letters that is nine

xylophones attack dog rabbies. incorporating open puppys fresh almond lactose???

wdikdt

> 
> 8 letters that is nine
> xylophones attack dog rabbies. incorporating open puppys fresh almond lactose???

Really? Simply random words with no attempt at meaning? -\_\_-

Who do I kiss downtown tonight?

Negative

Nearly every German anteater travels in vain eventually.

Random.

random access neatly describes our memory

Buying Leather Armour, Three Trillion, Email Responses.

Ponies

People Of Nebraska, I Enforce Safety

Atmospheric Insertion Requires Brushing Roughly Against Kerbin, Exclaimed Scientist.

Enthusiasts Admire Simple Years.

KEBAB

KErbals Be A Bi.... wait I can do better.

Kerbals Everywhere Baked A Bean.

...okay, no I can't xP

Ahem.

FOINEWM

For One Individual, No Enhancement Matters.

THWY

Then he went "YATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATATA".

Also, you missed W.

HIGUYS
